Past Events

April 17-19, 2016

Ft. Lauderdale, FL

SelectUSA on the Business Facilities LiveXchange 2016 Keynote Panel

SelectUSA’s Deputy Executive Director Peggy Philbin will be featured on the Keynote Panel at Business Facilities’ LiveXchange 2016 in Chicago, IL on April 17-19. Business Facilities, a full-service media brand specializing in site selection and as a source of intelligence on corporate expansion for C-level executives and business leaders, will hold its 12th annual conference with a focus on the intersection of trade and economic development. The Panel will discuss the latest trends in foreign direct investment (FDI) and exports.

For more information on Business Facilities and the annual LiveXchange conference, please visit the organization’s website.
